channel.title: Upgrading to V10 beta
channel.description: Hi all! I am facing problems with upgrading self-hosted redash, in docker-compose.yml there is no dockertag to change and no QUEUES and WORKERS_COUNT. Therefore I can not upgrade.

item.title: Upgrading to V10 beta

item.description:
What version of Redash are you running today? How did you install it?
